pasta.repository

Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
        • pasta.repository.UserDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    @Repository(value="userDAO")
public class UserDAO
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
    The Data access object for the User class.

    This class is responsible for all of the interaction between the data layer (disk in this case) and the system for managing users.

    Since:
    2012-11-13
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu

      • updateCachedUser

        public void updateCachedUser(PASTAUser user)
        Update the cached user.

        Add them to the correct maps, handle stream or tutorial changing.

        Parameters:
        user - the user to be updated

      • deleteCachedUser

        public void deleteCachedUser(PASTAUser user)
        Delete the a user from the cache.

        Remove them from all of the maps, but do not change any information on the disk

        Parameters:
        user - the user getting removed

      • getUser

        public PASTAUser getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Get the user

        Check if the list of all users exists, if not load it from the database.

        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        the user or null if the user does not exist

      • getUserList

        public java.util.Collection<PASTAUser> getUserList()
        Get the collection of all users.

        This list includes students, tutors and instructors.

        Returns:
        the collection of all users registered in the system

      • getStudentList

        public java.util.Collection<PASTAUser> getStudentList()
        Get the collection of students
        Returns:
        the collection of all students registered in the system

      • getUserListByTutorial

        public java.util.Collection<PASTAUser> getUserListByTutorial(java.lang.String tutorialName)
        Get the set of users in a given tutorial

        Will never return null.

        Parameters:
        tutorialName - the name of the tutorial
        Returns:
        the collection of students in a given tutorial

      • getUserListByStream

        public java.util.Collection<PASTAUser> getUserListByStream(java.lang.String streamName)
        Get the set of users in a given stream

        Will never return null.

        Parameters:
        streamName - the name of the stream
        Returns:
        the collection of users in a given stream

      • getTutorialByStream

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> getTutorialByStream()
        Get the map of tutorials by the streams they are in.
        Returns:
        a map with key as the stream name and value as the collection of tutorial names

      • add

        public void add(PASTAUser user)
        Add a user to the system.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be added.

      • loadUsers

        private void loadUsers()
        Load all of the users into cache.

        1. Load the users from the database
        2. Load any extensions the students may have
        3. Put them in the correct caching maps

      • deleteSingleUser

        public void deleteSingleUser(PASTAUser toDelete)
        Delete a single user.

        Does not delete anything from disk.

        Parameters:
        toDelete - the user to delete.
